title: Classic Spaghetti Carbonara
description: A traditional Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, and pancetta
steps: Bring a large pot of salted water to boil and cook spaghetti according to package directions
While pasta cooks, fry pancetta in a large skillet until crispy
In a bowl, whisk together eggs, both cheeses, and plenty of black pepper
Reserve 1 cup pasta water before draining
Add hot pasta to the skillet with pancetta
Remove from heat and quickly stir in egg mixture, adding pasta water as needed
Serve immediately with extra cheese and pepper

title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
description: Soft and chewy homemade chocolate chip cookies
steps: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C)
Mix flour, baking soda, and salt in a bowl
Cream butter and both sugars until fluffy
Beat in eggs and vanilla
Gradually mix in flour mixture
Stir in chocolate chips
Drop rounded tablespoons onto ungreased baking sheets
Bake 9-11 minutes until golden brown
Cool on baking sheet for 2 minutes before transferring

title: Grilled Salmon with Lemon Herbs
description: Perfectly grilled salmon with fresh herbs and lemon
steps: Preheat grill to medium-high heat
Mix olive oil, herbs, and garlic in a bowl
Season salmon with salt and pepper
Brush salmon with herb mixture
Grill salmon 4-5 minutes per side
Top with lemon slices during last 2 minutes
Serve immediately with remaining herb oil

title: Vegetarian Buddha Bowl
description: Nutritious bowl with quinoa, roasted vegetables, and tahini dressing
steps: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C)
Cook quinoa according to package directions
Toss sweet potato and broccoli with olive oil, salt, and pepper
Roast vegetables for 25-30 minutes
Roast chickpeas for last 15 minutes
Whisk together tahini, lemon juice, and maple syrup for dressing
Assemble bowls with quinoa, vegetables, and spinach
Drizzle with tahini dressing

title: Beef Tacos with Homemade Salsa
description: Flavorful ground beef tacos with fresh salsa and toppings
ingredients: Lettuce, cheese, sour cream for serving
steps: Make salsa by combining tomatoes, red onion, jalapeño, cilantro, and lime juice
Cook ground beef with onion and garlic until browned
Add chili powder, cumin, salt, and pepper
Simmer for 10 minutes
Warm taco shells according to package directions
Fill shells with beef mixture
Top with lettuce, cheese, sour cream, and salsa

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
description: Creamy and aromatic Indian curry with tender chicken
steps: Marinate chicken in yogurt and 1 tbsp garam masala for 30 minutes
Heat oil in a large pan and cook chicken until browned
Remove chicken and sauté onion, garlic, and ginger
Add tomato paste and remaining garam masala
Add crushed tomatoes and simmer 10 minutes
Stir in cream and return chicken to pan
Simmer 15 minutes until chicken is cooked through
Garnish with cilantro and serve with rice

title: Greek Salad
description: Fresh Mediterranean salad with feta cheese and olives
steps: Combine tomatoes, cucumber, onion, and bell pepper in a large bowl
Add olives and feta cheese
Whisk together olive oil, vinegar, oregano, salt, and pepper
Pour dressing over salad and toss gently
Let stand 10 minutes before serving
Serve at room temperature

title: Banana Bread
description: Moist and delicious homemade banana bread
steps: Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C)
Grease a 9x5 inch loaf pan
Mix mashed bananas and melted butter in a large bowl
Stir in sugar, egg, and vanilla
Add baking soda and salt
Mix in flour until just combined
Fold in walnuts if using
Pour into prepared pan and bake 60-65 minutes
Cool in pan 10 minutes before removing

title: Mushroom Risotto
description: Creamy Italian rice dish with mixed mushrooms
ingredients: 4 cups warm chicken or vegetable broth
steps: Sauté mushrooms in olive oil until golden, set aside
In same pan, cook onion and garlic until soft
Add rice and stir for 2 minutes
Add wine and stir until absorbed
Add warm broth one ladle at a time, stirring constantly
Continue until rice is creamy and tender, about 20 minutes
Stir in mushrooms, butter, and Parmesan
Garnish with fresh herbs

title: Avocado Toast
description: Simple and healthy breakfast with perfectly ripe avocado
steps: Toast bread slices until golden brown
Mash avocado with lemon juice, salt, and pepper
Spread avocado mixture on toast
Drizzle with olive oil
Sprinkle with red pepper flakes and everything seasoning
Top with cherry tomatoes if desired
Serve immediately
